snippet: A St. Louis County judge reinstated Adam Paul as mayor of Ellisville on Monday, nearly three months after the City Council removed him in an acrimonious and personal dispute.
abstract: St Louis County judge reinstates Adam Paul as mayor of Ellisville, Mo, nearly three months after City Council removed him in an acrimonious and personal dispute; nullifies Council’s impeachment proceeding, saying it violates Paul’s due process rights.
lead_paragraph: A St. Louis County judge reinstated Adam Paul as mayor of Ellisville on Monday, nearly three months after the City Council removed him in an acrimonious and personal dispute.
